original_text: Now Mesha king of Moab raised sheep, and he had to pay the king of Israel a tribute of a hundred thousand lambs and the wool of a hundred thousand rams.
korean_text: 모압 왕 메사는 양을 치는 자라 새끼 양 십만 마리의 털과 숫양 십만 마리의 털을 이스라엘 왕에게 바치더니

sentences.original_text: Now Mesha king of Moab raised sheep
and he had to pay the king of Israel a tribute
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이스라엘 왕에게 조공을 바쳐야 했는데

sentences.original_text: and the wool of a hundred thousand rams
